title: Manolo Gabbiadini set for transfer deadline day medical at Southampton ahead of £17million move from Napoli
text:
Sport Manolo Gabbiadini set for transfer deadline day medical at Southampton ahead of £17million move from Napoli The Italian forward is set to complete a four-year deal on the south coast after the Saints agreed a deal with Napoli Share By Darren Lewis Adrian Kajumba 00:31, 31 JAN 2017 Manolo Gabbiadini is set to become a Saint (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Manolo Gabbiadini is due to have a Southampton medical before a deal is finalised on transfer deadline day after they agreed a £17.2m deal with Napoli. 
The two clubs finally reached an agreement on Monday after weeks of on-off negotiations for the Italy forward. 
Southampton will pay Napoli an initial £14.6m for Gabbiadini, who has been capped six times, with a further £2.6m due in add ons. 
The Italy forward's arrival at St Mary's will help bolster boss Claude Puel's striking options after losing Charlie Austin until April due to a shoulder injury. Saints agreed a £17.2m deal with Napoli on Monday (Photo: Maurizio Lagana / Getty) 
The 25-year-old marksman, who is set for a four-year deal worth £40,000-a-week, has scored just five goals in 19 appearances this season. 
Southampton have beaten off a number of Premier League clubs for his signature. 
Everton were keen on his services last summer and also this month but Puel has won the battle. Like us on Facebook
